text: Hello Child, you have finally woken up.
I was scared that you might have died in your sleep.
But you look more ready then ever to go to the factory again.
Yes I do feel alot better then before.
I dint expect to get over that feaver so quickly.
I also feel sick, but I dont have the money for the medicine from up TOP
I dont think my week old body can take this for long.
Only God knows if we will see each other when you return.
